data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Tim has been feeling lately like he just can't get anything done. He ____ plenty ____ coffee, and ____ to ____ himself, but ____ just can't achieve ____. He ____ that ____ problem ____ be a lack ____ sleep, or ____ he ____ an ____. He definitely needs to figure it out so that he can accomplish more.
data.partBlankContent: Tim has been feeling lately like he just can't get anything done. He dri___ plenty o_ coffee, and tr___ to moti____ himself, but h_ just can't achieve anyt____. He gue____ that t__ problem mi___ be a lack o_ sleep, or per____ he h__ an ill____. He definitely needs to figure it out so that he can accomplish more.
data.fullContent: Tim has been feeling lately like he just can't get anything done. He drinks plenty of coffee, and tries to motivate himself, but he just can't achieve anything. He guesses that the problem might be a lack of sleep, or perhaps he has an illness. He definitely needs to figure it out so that he can accomplish more.
data.answer: 提姆最近一直觉得他什么事都做不成。他喝大量的咖啡，并试图激励自己，但他还是不能实现任何事情。他猜测问题可能是睡眠不足，或者他生病了。他肯定需要弄清楚，这样他才能完成更多。
